com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl

Class ZendeskHelpCenterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl.ZendeskService
      • com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl.ZendeskHelpCenterService

  • public class ZendeskHelpCenterService
extends ZendeskService
    Service to provide GET operations for Help Center objects by wrapping the HelpCenterService

    • Method Detail

      • getCategories

        public void getCategories(String authorizationHeader,
                 Locale locale,
                 ZendeskCallback<List<Category>> callback)
        Get list of categories in a Help Center instance
        Parameters:
        authorizationHeader - a bearer authorization header for access control, may be null for Help Centers that are not password protected
        locale - locale filter to request only sections for the given locale
        callback - callback called on the state change of the request being called

      • getSectionsForCategory

        public void getSectionsForCategory(String authorizationHeader,
                          Long categoryId,
                          Locale locale,
                          ZendeskCallback<List<Section>> callback)
        Get list of sections in a Help Center instance
        Parameters:
        authorizationHeader - a bearer authorization header for access control, may be null for Help Centers that are not password protected
        categoryId - categoryId to which sections will be retrieved
        locale - locale filter to request only sections for the given locale
        callback - callback called on the state change of the request being called

      • getArticlesForSection

        public void getArticlesForSection(String authorizationHeader,
                         Long sectionId,
                         Locale locale,
                         String include,
                         ZendeskCallback<List<Article>> callback)
        Get list of articles for a given section in a Help Center instance
        Parameters:
        authorizationHeader - a bearer authorization header for access control, may be null for Help Centers that are not password protected
        locale - locale filter to request only sections for the given locale
        include - The sideloads to include
        callback - callback called on the state change of the request being called

      • getArticle

        public void getArticle(String authorizationHeader,
              Long articleId,
              Locale locale,
              String include,
              ZendeskCallback<Article> callback)
        Get a single article based on the given article id
        Parameters:
        authorizationHeader - a bearer authorization header for access control, may be null for Help Centers that are not password protected
        articleId - The article id to be used to fetch the individual article
        locale - The locale that will limit results to articles with this locale.
        include - The sideloads to include
        callback - callback called on the state changes of the request being invoked

      • getAttachments

        public void getAttachments(String authorizationHeader,
                  Long articleId,
                  AttachmentType type,
                  ZendeskCallback<List<Attachment>> callback)
        Get list of attachments for a given article from help center
        Parameters:
        authorizationHeader - a bearer authorization header for access control, may be null for Help Centers that are not password protected
        articleId - The article id to be used to filter which attachments should be fetched
        type - set which type of tickets to be retrieved from
        callback - callback called on the state change of the request being invoked
